resources.string: App is testing your network connection to determine if any required ports are blocked.\n\nThis may take a few seconds…

Your network does not appear to be blocking. If you still have trouble connecting, check your PC\'s firewall settings.\n\nIf you are trying to stream over the Internet, install the App Internet Hosting Tool on your PC and run the included Internet Streaming Tester to check your PC\'s Internet connection.
The network test could not be performed because none of App\'s connection testing servers were reachable. Check your Internet connection or try again later.

Your device's current network connection seems to be blocking App. Streaming over the Internet may not work while connected to this network.

The following network ports were blocked:
Your device\'s current network connection is blocking. Streaming over the Internet may not work while connected to this network.
GFE returned an HTTP 404 error. Make sure your PC is running a supported GPU. Using remote desktop software can also cause this error. Try rebooting your machine or reinstalling GFE.
USB access is prohibited by your device administrator. Check your Knox or MDM settings.
Video decoder failed to initialize. Your device may not support the selected resolution or frame rate.
Your network connection isn\'t performing well. Reduce your video bitrate setting or try a faster connection.
Something went wrong on your host PC when starting the stream.\n\nMake sure you don\'t have any DRM-protected content open on your host PC. You can also try restarting your host PC.
The host PC reported a fatal video encoding error.\n\nTry disabling HDR mode, changing the streaming resolution, or changing your host PC\'s display resolution.
Check your firewall and port forwarding rules for port(s):
Slow connection to PC\nReduce your bitrate
Frames dropped by your network connection: %1$.2f%%
Unable to resolve PC address. Make sure you didn\'t make a typo in the address.
That address doesn\'t look right. You must use your router\'s public IP address for streaming over the Internet.
Gamepad type may be changed due to motion sensor emulation
An error occurred. Please try again by pressing the button below.\n\nIn case the issue persists, kindly get in touch with us at support@antcloud.co
For invoicing purposes, we need your accurate location.
Sorry! We\'re not accepting any new members. Please follow our social media handles for any updates.
Warning: Purchasing this plan means your data will not transfer to your new PC.\n\nBe cautious as all information will not be accessible once you migrate to a different PC.

Warning: Your current subscription period isn't finished yet. 

If you purchase this plan, it will get activated once your current period finishes. 

For more hours, we recommend a Top up plan.
Note: Sorry! The Intro tier slots are currently full. \n\nYou can purchase the other plan tiers.
Note: Sorry! The Advanced tier slots are currently full. \n\nYou can purchase the other plan tiers.
Note: Sorry! The Super tier slots are currently full. \n\nYou can purchase the other plan tiers.
After submitting the coupon code, select your intended plan to purchase it with the applied coupon code.
There was an issue starting your PC.\n kindly try the following points to troubleshoot your issue

"• Please refresh your page, wait for 3-4 mins & try again. Your PC will be reset in that time.

• Kindly ensure that you are not connected to any VPN services.

• If the above two points did not help, click below for raising a support request."
You seem to be unable to start a video connection with the PC. Please check your internet connection once and try again.
An update for the app is currently available. Please update your app
Your Stream has ended! Please click below to go back to your dashboard!
Are you sure you want to exit?
The email or password provided is incorrect
